Sentencas: In this thermodynamic investigation, an integrated energy system based on hydrogen fuel is developed and studied energetically and exergetically.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis and assessment of an integrated hydrogen fuel cell system for ships

Sentencas: The liquefied hydrogen fueled solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) based system is then integrated with a steam producing cycle to supply electricity and potable water to ships.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis and assessment of an integrated hydrogen fuel cell system for ships

Sentencas: The first heat recovery system, after the fuel cells provide thrust for the ship, is by means of a turbine while the second heat recovery system drives the ship's refrigeration cycle.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis and assessment of an integrated hydrogen fuel cell system for ships

Sentencas: This study includes energy and exergy performance evaluations of SOFC, refrigeration cycle and ship thrust engine systems.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis and assessment of an integrated hydrogen fuel cell system for ships

Sentencas: Furthermore, the effectiveness of SOFCs and a hydrogen fueled engine in reducing greenhouse gas emissions are assessed parametrically through a case study.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis and assessment of an integrated hydrogen fuel cell system for ships

Sentencas: The main propulsion, power generation from the solid oxide fuel cells, absorption chiller, and steam bottoming cycle systems together have the overall energy and exergy efficiencies of 41.53% and 37.13%, respectively.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis and assessment of an integrated hydrogen fuel cell system for ships
